translations: n.平民主义者，平民论者；平民党党员

sentences.sentence: Populists are prodding PT to carry out its ambitious agenda.
sentences.translation: 平民党也在敦促为泰党实现野心勃勃的议程。

sentences.sentence: Competition for jobs is rising with unemployment. Conservatives and populists remain combustible.
sentences.translation: 工作机会竞争加剧，失业率上升，保守主义和民粹情绪一触即发。

sentences.sentence: Western populists will no doubt once again try to blame their own sluggish performance on "unfair" Asia.
sentences.translation: 西方民粹派无疑又会将亚洲的“不公”作为自身疲软的一个怪罪的借口。
